Title: Quotation from Chairman Mao: Prepare for war, prepare for famine, for the people. Practice thrift and wage revolution
Publisher: Yunnan Provincial Branch of the People's Bank of China (中国人民银行云南省分行)
Notes: The policy of practising thrift and waging revolution was promulgated in February 1968. The sign combining gears and grain reads "Save for the revolution" (为革命储蓄, wei geming chuxu).
